description: Surely we have all encountered small troubles in everyday life, from clothes pockets being overloaded with many items to keys, headphones, and phones being lost. lost in the backpacks and bags that we put into them haphazardly. But then we gradually consider it a habit and live with these small problems...

about.story-meaning: With the message More than Simplicity, Camelia devotes all its heart to making its products. Not only is the simplicity of the exterior design helping users save time thinking about choosing suitable clothes, and the internal design of each product is carefully and streamlined to create convenience and order for the user.
